casebody.head_matter:
593 A.2d 402
TRANEL, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 9, 1991.
Decided May 29, 1991.

Leon H. Kline, Philadelphia, for appellant.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
